content.en: Spatial data transformations: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the accuracy of linear transformations of spatial data. These algorithms, such as the Structured Total Least Norm (STLN) method, the multivariate total least-squares approach, and the improved weighted total least squares method, aim to enhance the precision of coordinate transformations and linear fitting. Additionally, algorithms like the weighted total least-squares approach and the errors-in-variables model extension with singular dispersion matrices provide robust solutions for errors-in-variables models.
content.da: Rumlige data transformationer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af lineære transformationer af rumlige data. Disse algoritmer, såsom den strukturerede Total Least Norm (STLN) metode, den multivariate total least-squares tilgang og den forbedrede vægtede total least squares metode, sigter mod at øge præcisionen af koordinattransformationer og lineær tilpasning. Desuden tilbyder algoritmer som den vægtede total least-squares tilgang og fejl-i-variable-modellen udvidelsen med singulære dispersionsmatricer robuste løsninger for fejl-i-variable modeller.
